name: src/exceptions.js
src/http.js

params.name: options
params.description: A hash of settings for this client.

name: src/index.js
src/interceptors.js
RequestInterceptorChain
description: Runs the request interceptors, and requestError interceptors if necessary.

params.name: interceptors
params.description: The array of interceptors to be run

params.name: accept
params.description:
Callback that is invoked with the final request
object after all interceptors have run successfully.

params.name: reject
params.description:
Callback that is invoked with an error object
if all of the interceptors fail to recover from an error.

name: ResponseInterceptorChain
description: Runs the response interceptors, and responseError interceptors if necessary.

params.name: interceptors
params.description: The array of interceptors to be run

params.name: accept
params.description:
Callback that is invoked with the final response
object after all interceptors have run successfully.

params.name: reject
params.description:
Callback that is invoked with an error object
if all of the interceptors fail to recover from an error.

name: src/path.js
src/request.js
Request
description: A Request should only ever be created by an instance of {@link Http}

params.name: config
params.description: Override default settings for this Request only.

params.name: value
params.description: The HTTP method for this request

unknown.tagValue:
{string|Request} - If value is specified, sets the header
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns the
value for the header.

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the header

params.name: value
params.description: The value to assign to the header

return.description:
If value is specified, sets the header
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns the
value for the header.

unknown.tagValue:
{object|Request} - If value is specified, sets the headers
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns a copy
of the current headers.

params.name: value
params.description:
The hash of headers to send with this request.
Replaces any existing headers

return.description:
If value is specified, sets the headers
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns a copy
of the current headers.

params.name: value
params.description: The body for this request

unknown.tagValue:
{Url|Request} - If value is specified, sets the {@link Url} for
this request and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted,
returns the current {@link Url}.

params.name: value
params.description: The {@link Url} for this request.

return.description:
If value is specified, sets the {@link Url} for
this request and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted,
returns the current {@link Url}.

params.name: value
params.description: The number of times this request will be retried on failure.

params.name: value
params.description: The set of interceptors to be run against this Request and/or Response

unknown.tagValue:
{string|Request} - If the value is specified, sets the name of the XSRF Cookie
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns the current name.

params.name: value
params.description: The name of the XSRF cookie

return.description:
If the value is specified, sets the name of the XSRF Cookie
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns the current name.

unknown.tagValue:
{string|Request} - If the value is specified, sets the name of the XSRF Header
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns the current name.

params.name: value
params.description: The name of the XSRF header

return.description:
If the value is specified, sets the name of the XSRF Header
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns the current name.

unknown.tagValue:
{boolean|Request} - If the value is specified, sets the withCredentials flag
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns the current
value of the flag.

params.name: value
params.description:
Flag indicating whether cross-site AccessControl
requests should be made using cookies, authorization headers, or TLS client
certificates.  More detail: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/XMLHttpRequest/withCredentials

return.description:
If the value is specified, sets the withCredentials flag
and returns the current Request.  If value is ommitted, returns the current
value of the flag.

unknown.tagValue:
{string|Request} - If the value is specified, sets the username and returns
the current Request.  If value is ommitted, retursn the current username.

params.name: value
params.description: Basic auth username

return.description:
If the value is specified, sets the username and returns
the current Request.  If value is ommitted, retursn the current username.

unknown.tagValue:
{string|Request} - If the value is specified, sets the password and returns
the current Request.  If value is ommitted, retursn the current password.

params.name: value
params.description: Basic auth password

return.description:
If the value is specified, sets the password and returns
the current Request.  If value is ommitted, retursn the current password.

name: execute

unknown.tagValue:
{Object} - Executes the request and returns an object containing
the response, uploadProgress, and downloadProgress streams.

return.description:
Executes the request and returns an object containing
the response, uploadProgress, and downloadProgress streams.

name: src/response.js
Response
description: Immutable response container.  Should only be created by executing a {@link Request}.

params.name: body
params.description: An Observable representing the body/entity of the response

params.name: uploadProgress
params.description: An Observable representing a stream of all upload progress events

params.name: downloadProgress
params.description: An Observable representing a stram of all download progress events

unknown.tagValue: {Observable<Object>} - an Observable stream of upload progress events

return.description: an Observable stream of upload progress events

unknown.tagValue: {Observable<Object>} - an Observable stream of download progress events

return.description: an Observable stream of download progress events

unknown.tagValue: {Observable<string>} - An Observable stream of the response body/entity contents

return.description: An Observable stream of the response body/entity contents

unknown.tagValue: {number} - The HTTP status code of the response

return.description: The HTTP status code of the response

unknown.tagValue: {string} - The status text of the response

return.description: The status text of the response

unknown.tagValue: {Object} - An object containing the response headers

return.description: An object containing the response headers

name: header
description: Look-up the value of an individual resonse header

unknown.tagValue: {string} - The value of the header, or undefined if not found

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the header to lookup

return.description: The value of the header, or undefined if not found

unknown.tagValue:
{boolean} - Determines if this is a chunked response.  A chunked
response will send each chunk through the {@link body} stream.  A non-chunked
response will only push the final result through the stream.

return.description:
Determines if this is a chunked response.  A chunked
response will send each chunk through the {@link body} stream.  A non-chunked
response will only push the final result through the stream.

name: src/url.js
src/utilities.js
src/xhr-builder.js
XHRBuilder
description: Internal class used to construct and XMLHttpRequest

name: src/xhr-provider.js

unknown.tagValue:
Provider-implementation for browser-based clients.  Providers are simply
functions that take in a {@link Request} and return an RxJS Observable
that eventually contains the {@link Response}.
{Observable<Response>}
